summary: The document is a memorandum dated 11 January 1962, detailing contacts between PM case officers and various segments of the Cuban Revolutionary Council (CRC). It lists individuals associated with the CRC and their respective case officers, indicating a structured interaction or monitoring of these individuals by the mentioned officers. This memorandum is part of the records related to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, suggesting its relevance to historical investigations into the period.
key_findings: The memorandum is part of the records related to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It details specific contacts between PM case officers and members of the Cuban Revolutionary Council (CRC), suggesting surveillance or operational coordination.
The document lists names of CRC members and their corresponding case officers, highlighting a network of interactions.
